summary: HeaderNav was updated to render a logo image next to the existing brand text, but the requested static logo asset (download-1.webp) is not shown as added under frontend/public/assets/generated in the diff summary. Two ancillary project metadata/summary files were also modified without being requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the newly uploaded logo (download-1.webp) as a static image asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and create a crisp, centered, square logo file suitable for web use.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no added files, and no evidence of a new image asset under frontend/public/assets/generated. HeaderNav references a PNG filename, but the asset itself is not present in the diff and the requested source filename was download-1.webp.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project metadata/state tracking files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to add a logo asset and update HeaderNav; it does not request updates to repository summary/state files.
